definitions.definition: commit (a person or organization) by a solemn promise.
examples: the government pledged itself to deal with environmental problems

definitions.definition: formally declare or promise that something is or will be the case.
examples: the president pledged that 20,000 government buildings would have solar roofs
synonyms: avow "he pledged to root out corruption"

examples: they pledged to continue the campaign for funding
Japan pledged $100 million in humanitarian aid

definitions.definition: give as security on a loan.
examples: the creditor to whom the land is pledged
synonyms: pawn "his home is pledged as security against the loan"

definitions.definition: promise to join (a fraternity or sorority).
examples: Francie and I pledged the same sorority
